# List of Guggenheim Fellowships awarded in 1972

Three hundred and seventy-two scholars, artists, and scientists received Guggenheim Fellowships in 1972. $3,819,000 was disbursed between the recipients, who were chosen from an applicant pool of 2,506. Of the 96 universities represented, University of California, Berkeley had the most winners on its faculty (24), with Harvard University (22) claiming second and Stanford University (12) claiming third.
